reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks more expensive than it is, with a perfect summer weight that's not scratchy or hot. Moreover, the fabric is incredibly soft, and the color hasn't faded at all. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others find it runs large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goes With Anything!
items.body: Perfect Top! Great quality, looks just like picture. Nice and thick material, vibrant color and fits spectacular. I bought a small and it looked big until I put on and it was perfect! Not too big and comfortable. Can wear with anything from jeans to a skirt. Bought 4 more! Read more
items.author: Susieqyc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't hesitate, but it!!
items.body: Bought the black with white trim . A classic look . I usually can wear a large , sometimes medium . I bought medium. The sweater rounded collar fits nicely and is close to the neck . The sleeves are longer El and can cover your upper arm . The sweater is not too short and goes below the waist. Overall it's a win win! Looks really nice . Can be worn with jeans , black pants or white . Very happy with the fit , but maybe size down for a fitted look . And yes this sweater has just enough stretch , nice fabric and I didn't find it to be shiny as others mentioned . A nice cable stitch too. Very comfortable material is not thick but it seems thru soit would be good for a cool evening !! Read more
items.author: Kathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit and Great Quality
items.body: I absolutely love this short sleeve shirt! The fabric is soft, breathable, and feels great against the skin—perfect for warm weather. The fit is just right, not too tight or too loose, and it holds up well after multiple washes. The stitching is solid, and the color hasn’t faded at all. Whether I’m wearing it casually or dressing it up a bit, it always looks great. Highly recommend—I’ll definitely be ordering more in other colors! Read more
items.author: Annie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size down!
items.body: Runs way too big so size down. Nice quality and love the color. Washes well. Read more
items.author: Zonchick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth your money.
items.body: Wears great. Has a soft feel. Very comfortable and stylish. Read more
items.author: Gracie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lightweight Sweater!
items.body: This lightweight sweater is perfect! Perfect to layer under a blazer or cardigan. I'm 5'2" 125lbs, bought a small in the coffee color...fits perfectly, not too tight or too loose, nice stretch and soft material. I bought multiple colors! Good value! Read more
items.author: A. Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECTION
items.body: This sweater is perfect!! It’s lightweight and looked phenomenal on. I live in Florida so the warmth is perfect for wearing in my office. The softness of the fabric felt awesome, the sleeve length is just as shown in the picture. If you’re thinking about it BUY IT!! You will not be disappointed! Read more
items.author: Candice F.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but....
items.body: This was a nice sweater, but it made me look/feel older than I am. Wasn't really made for me. Read more
items.author: Lisa

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Grey White Stripe, Blue, Green White Stripe, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Light Cinnamon Black Stripe, White Black Stripe, Stripe Apricot, Apricot White Stripe, Light Pink White Stripe, Navy Blue White Stripe, Red, Embroidery Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
